name: Untitled Rpg (possumDev)
description:
small prototype of a game i am currently making on my free time with godot.

it's simple RPG made using a lot of free assets. i'm still working on the basic gameplay systems and features

any feedback or suggestions is more than welcome and thank you for checking out my
 game!

controls:

Z : Select, continue

X : Cancel, back

ESC : Open/close Menu
